Key Match Events: India failed to score 1 run after chasing a target of 231 runs
Asitha Fernando and Akila Dananjaya took 1 wicket each

Rohit Sharma said it's up to the players how much they can contribute to the team's success
Gautam Gambhir knows what he wants from the team
Charith Asalanka is one of our best players in this format
